Articles.Content:
This is a series of crafts. The finished set will be separated (Though occasionally dockable ships will dock) crafts - SUNBASE BETA.

The full series is crafts orbiting 2,999,999,999m Around the sun.

Currently completed crafts:

(Key: Name, then the craft name)

COMMAND CENTER (SPACE COLONY)

SPACE SHUTTLE (HYPER ROCKET)

HUB CENTER (SPACE DISCUS)

SUN STATION (SPACE STATION)

More coming soon so stay tuned!
